anya-e0105n34:1_0: Paramatthajotikaṁ nāma khuddakapāṭhassa ceva suttanipātassa ca aṭṭhakathaṁ kenacipi anāyācito attano icchāvaseneva akāsi.
anya-e0105n34:7_0: Tatheva ca ṭhitaṁ yasmā, navaṅgaṁ satthusāsanaṁ.
anya-e0105n34:12_0: Bahū pana vicakkhaṇā imā ārambhagāthāyo vicinitvā “netaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa viya vacanaṁ hotī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n34:12_2: ācariyabuddhaghoso hi yaṁ kañci ganthaṁ sīlādiguṇasampannena aññena āyācitova karoti,
anya-e0105n34:12_4: Punapi ācariyo “porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathaṁ bhāsāparivattanavasena karissāmī”ti ca “mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ vācanāmaggaṁ
anya-e0105n34:12_5: nissāya karissāmī”ti ca evaṁ paṭiññaṁ katvāva karoti,
anya-e0105n34:12_7: Punapi ācariyo atigambhīratthānaṁ catunnañcāgamānaṁ abhidhammassa ca saṁvaṇṇanārambhepi dukkarabhāvaṁ na katheti,
anya-e0105n34:12_8: idha pana “sāsanaṁ abodhantena mādisenā”ti attanā sāsanassa abuddhabhāvaṁ pakāsetvā “atidukkarā”ti ca katheti.
anya-e0105n34:12_11: ācariyo hi attano ganthanigamanesu “tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvenā”ti attano ñāṇappabhāvaṁ pakāsesi,
anya-e0105n34:12_12: so “sāsanaṁ abodhantena mādisena atidukkarā”ti īdisaṁ vacanaṁ na katheyyayevāti.
